name: abstract slime
description: An abstract object representing slimes.

name: slime
description: A simple green gelatinous slime, gradually moving across the ground.

name: red slime
//: red slimes have natural regeneration abilities
description: A red gelatinous slime, gradually moving across the ground. Its damage appears to somehow heal itself.

name: orange slime
//: orange slimes are 50% faster and have +1 more dodge
description: An orange gelatinous slime, gradually moving across the ground. It seems to move faster than a normal slime.

name: yellow slime
description: A yellow gelatinous slime, slowly moving across the ground. Its attacks may discharge electric currents.

special_attacks.hit_dmg_u: %1$s sends an electric current to your %2$s!
special_attacks.miss_msg_u: %1$s tries to send an electric current at you, but you dodge!
special_attacks.miss_msg_npc: %1$s tries to send an electric current at <npcname>, but they dodge!
special_attacks.no_dmg_msg_u: %1$s sends an electric current at you, but it reflects off your armor.
special_attacks.no_dmg_msg_npc: %1$s sends an electric current at <npcname>, but it reflects off their armor.

name: cyan slime
description: A cyan gelatinous slime, gradually moving across the ground. The air around it seems colder than usual.

special_attacks.monster_message: The air around %1$s begins to feel cold.

name: blue slime
//: blue slimes are 20% slower, but releases a blue cloud that causes disorientation
description: A blue gelatinous slime, slowly moving across the ground. It seems to release a blue cloud of gas sometimes.

special_attacks.monster_message: %1$s releases a cloud of blue gas!

name: purple slime
description: A purple gelatinous slime, gradually moving across the ground. It often appears to randomly shift positions in the blink of an eye.

special_attacks.monster_message: %1$s suddenly shifts to a new position!

name: pink slime
//: pink slimes can heal other slimes
description: A pink gelatinous slime, gradually moving across the ground. It has the ability to heal nearby slimes.

special_attacks.monster_message: %1$s sends out an aura to heal its nearby allies!

//2: SWARMS flag makes it more likely to stick with other slimes, in order to heal them

name: dasher slime
description: An orange gelatinous slime, with blue-colored stripes across its surface, gradually moving across the ground, and every so often appears to dash quickly towards its target for a brief moment.

special_attacks.message: The %s speeds up momentarily, dashing forward quickly!
special_attacks.//: Move cost is small, so it can potentially attack in the same turn it reaches its target.

name: transparent slime
description: A transparent gelatinous slime, gradually moving across the ground. It's so clear that you can see right through it, so it can be easy to miss unless you're paying attention.

name: black slime
description: A black gelatinous slime, gradually moving across the ground. It's so dark, it absorbs light from its surroundings, making it difficult to see at night.

name: dissolver slime
description: A black gelatinous slime, gradually moving across the ground. It appears to secrete a highly acidic chemical.
//: Note: Grabs have been reworked in 0.H experimental, so the value of grab_strength will need to be changed to reflect that.

special_attacks.miss_msg_u: %s tries to wrap around you, but you dodge!
special_attacks.miss_msg_npc: %s tries to wrap around <npcname>, but they dodge!

special_attacks.hit_dmg_u: %s secretes a dissolving chemical onto you!
special_attacks.no_dmg_msg_u: %s secretes a chemical, but it washes off your armor!
special_attacks.no_dmg_msg_npc: %s secretes a chemical onto <npcname>, but it washes off their armor!

name: speedy slime
description: A purplish gelatinous slime, sliding across the ground much more quickly and easily than a normal slime.

name: booster slime
description: A blue gelatinous slime, with orange stripes across its surface, gradually moving across the ground. It seems to be able to boost the spoed of nearby slimes.

special_attacks.monster_message: %1$s boosts the speed of itself and its nearby allies!

name: amoeba slime
description: A dark green gelatinous slime. This one seems to almost always be found in a group. They seem interconnected in such a way that killing one damages those around it.

death_function.message: As the amoeba slime dies, the nearby amoeba slimes appear weakened.

name: slime biter
//: These are very fast and aggressive, will attempt to bite
description: This red slime is small, but very fast and aggressive. It chases quickly after you, in an attempt to use its sharp teeth to bite you.

special_attacks.hit_dmg_u: %1$s lunges at you and bites your %2$s!
special_attacks.miss_msg_u: %1$s lunges for your %2$s, but you dodge!
special_attacks.no_dmg_msg_u: %1$s lunges at you and tries to bite your %2$s, but fails to penetrate armor!
special_attacks.no_dmg_msg_npc: %1$s lunges at <npcname> and tries to bite, but fails to penetrate armor!

name: slime hopper
description: This slime is small, but it seems to be quickly hopping around all over the place, sometimes in an unpredictable manner.

special_attacks.//: If far away, leap towards target
If close, make random, unpredictable leaps

name: aqua slime
description: An aqueous slime, often found near bodies of water.

name: glowing slime
description: A gelatinous slime that appears to glow in the dark while gradually moving across the ground.

name: lava slime
description: A gelatinous slime that seems to also be made out of lava. Faint smoke rises from its body.

special_attacks.monster_message: %1$s releases chunks of hot molten rock!

name: rubber slime
description: A rubbery slime, slowly moving across the ground. It seems a lot more durable than usual.

name: rubber slime
description: A colorless slime, gradually moving across the ground. It seems to be made with a substance that is quite durable, and appears to have a self-healing property.

name: diamond slime
description: A slime that appears to have some sparkly diamond mixed into it.

special_attacks.monster_message: %1$s releases shards of diamond in all directions!

name: intelligent slime
description: This slime's brain appears to be a bit more evolved than usual. It appears more intelligent than the other slimes.

name: friendly slime
description: This slime has recognized you as a friend, and stays by to protect you.
